page.title: 11A PUBLIC HOUSE IN WILMSLOW
page.content: The 'Horse and Jockey' is one of{7 {pubs}in our area. It has been open for about{70 years.}The pub opens each day 11.30 am to 3.30 pm and 5.30 to 10.30. Friday and Sunday are the busiest days for Mr.Dean the owner of the pub.The pub has a small bar and a big room with tables and upholstered chairs. The most popular drinks are bitter beer and lager.Mr.Dean orders{400 {gallons}each week.Mr.Dean has owned the pub for{18 years.}He thinks that a good landlord must be able to mix well with the public.Besides drinking, the public chat, play pool and cards. Around 60 to{70}people go to the pub each week night. Next to post office in our area there are a few old houses.People say that those houses used to be the 'Horse and Jockey'.
